name: INReservation
desc: An object that describes a reservation.

items.name: var reservationStatus: INReservationStatus
items.desc: The current status of the reservation.

items.name: var bookingTime: Date?
items.desc: The date and time the user booked the reservation.

items.name: var itemReference: INSpeakableString
items.desc: A unique reference for the reservation.

items.name: var actions: [INReservationAction]?
items.desc: An array containing actions the user can perform on the reservation.

items.name: var url: URL?
items.desc: A webpage the user can access to view reservation details.
